detaileddescription.para: SW Unit testing is accomplished through SWATT. The test cases are based on this SWDD.

sect1.title: Verification of Resource Consumption
sect1.para: SW Unit testing is accomplished thru SWATT. The test casea are based on this design, and shall also cover the configuration options.

The measured values can be found in the following files on the DID-share locations:
Filename
Location
Chorus_Resource_Consumption.xlsx

sect1.title: Verification by Review
sect1.para: The verification of the SWDD is performed by review. The review process is part of the development process within JIRA. The review template can be found here [CA050003801 SDD Review Template].

sect1.title: Verification by Testing
sect1.para: The functions of Network Diagnostic Flag are tested automatically by a SWATT test. See links at the related functions under "CHORUS\mc_sw\cdd\ECU_DIAG_Chorus\NetworkDiagnosisFlag\test\Unittest".
